reviewText:
Forbidden Arsenal was released in 1991 and is directed by Cheng Siu Keung. The movie stars Robin Shou,Cynthia Khan,Waise Lee,To Siu Chung,Rachel Lee Lai,Gary Chau Ging,Phillip Kwok.

Three detectives from Hong Kong,Taiwan,Mainland China team up to stop a gun runner in Hong Kong.

This movie has all sorts of action from guns,grenades,to staffs,swords,hand to hand.
